description:
Curtis was a referral from another photographer. When he showed up for our first meeting, I couldn't believe how well he was dressed. Expensive shirt, nice leather jacket, the works. He's definitely very well groomed for a straight guy!
Curtis was remarkably easy to work with. He has to be one of the nicest models I've ever dealt with. And what a body — muscular, vascular, and tight!
title: Curtis
